lemma wlp_while_mono: assumes "\<And>P. is_quantum_predicate P \<Longrightarrow> is_quantum_predicate (WS P)" and "\<And>P Q. is_quantum_predicate P \<Longrightarrow> is_quantum_predicate Q \<Longrightarrow> P \<le>\<^sub>L Q \<Longrightarrow> WS P \<le>\<^sub>L WS Q" and "measurement d 2 M" and "is_quantum_predicate P" and "is_quantum_predicate Q" and "P \<le>\<^sub>L Q" shows "wlp_while (M 0) (M 1) WS P \<le>\<^sub>L wlp_while (M 0) (M 1) WS Q"
